data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Kelantan, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kelantan, Malaysia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kelantan, Malaysia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Kelantan, Malaysia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, help the 57,527 believers in Kelantan to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 1,577,474 lost friends and neighbors.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Sabum people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, move the 57,527 believers in the state of Kelantan to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Kelantan, Malaysia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kelantan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Kelantan
location.cities_list: Kota Bharu, Kampong Pangkal Kalong, Tanah Merah, Peringat, Gua Musang
location.cities_list_w_pop: Kota Bharu (1,459,994), Kampong Pangkal Kalong (39,904), Tanah Merah (29,116), Peringat (23,288), Gua Musang (19,731)
